If you would like to join the chapter and get on our mailing list, please [fill out this form](https://forms.gle/sVexTC3yWopNWB6o9). 

**Chapter members get free SIAM membership!** [Learn more about the benefits of SIAM membership here](https://www.siam.org/membership/individual-membership/student-membership/). Membership benefits include increased networking, discounts on conference registration and SIAM books, access to SIAM review, and more.
